content: Improving the process around the project is also important. Since Jan mentioned this had been going on for 18 months there are probably some processes that need to be revisited. Like are handoffs between developers and designers happening smoothly? Is someone periodically reviewing and the features that are complete to track progress? Are people making accurate estimates for the time it is taking to complete pieces of the project? How are people notifying one another when they need help or are stuck?
